meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mark Adams Peggy Szymeczek Hunter Appler Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7319.

td.p: Mark Adams, a health benefits advisor from Johnstown, Pennsylvania
Peggy Szymeczek, a retired civil servant from Gilbert, Arizona
Hunter Appler, an attorney originally from Mount Airy, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $24,801)

tr.td: PUNNY LITERARY TITLES
(Alex: You have to give us a response that is a pun that's very close to the original work.)
TAKE A LETTER
MINOR ROLES, MAJOR MOTION PICTURE
(Alex: And each film was a nominee for the Oscar as best film in 2015.)
"BEE" MINE
BEVERLY HILLS
A JASON

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Peggy: What is Heart of Darkness?)
...
(Alex: Remember, it\'s gotta be punny.)
(Peggy: Right.)

Tart of Darkness

HunterPeggy
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
